title: Ep - 112 - BEKAH MARTINEZ FROM THE BACHELOR
description:
Bekah Martinez appeared on the 22nd season of ABC’s The Bachelor vying for 36-year-old Arie Luyendyk Jr., a real estate agent and race car driver from Scottsdale, Arizona. Bekah discusses her initial feelings when she found out Arie was The Bachelor, when she knew it wouldn’t work between them, what it is like to be a member of Bachelor Nation, why she was listed on the missing persons list, and the juiciest story that will come out of Bachelor in Paradise. 


Actress, writer, and podcast host Heather Brooker helps Kate review the season premiere of Big Brother on CBS. 


Forbes reporter Kristi Dosh discusses this week’s episode of Total Bellas on E! She and Kate debate whether Nikki Bella will ever have a baby with John Cena. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
